titleInfo.title: USA v. Wright et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting in part 40 Motion to Consolidate Cases as to Antwan L. Wright (1), Leonard C. Jones (2), Ray S. Thomas (3), Joseph T. Jordan (4), Frederick R. Croffer (5). Cases Nos. 8:08cr438, 8:08cr439, 8:08cr440, 8:08cr441, 8:08cr442, 8:08cr443, 8:08cr444, 8:08cr445, 8:08cr446, 8:08cr447, 8:08cr448, and 8:08cr449 are hereby consolidated for purposes of scheduling and pretrial proceedings. The deadline for filing substantive pretrial motions is extended to 2/23/2009, as to all the defendants in Cases Nos. 8:08cr438, 8:08cr439, 8:08cr440, 8:08cr441, 8:08cr442, 8:08cr443, 8:08cr444, 8:08cr445, 8:08cr446, 8:08cr447, 8:08cr448, and 8:08cr449. The time between today's date and 2/23/2009 is excluded under the Speedy Trial Act. The request for a Rule 17.1 conference is denied without prejudice to re-filing after 2/23/2009. Ordered by Magistrate Judge F. A. Gossett. ( CLS, ) Modified on 2/2/2009 (CLS, ).ORDER granting in part 40 Motion to Consolidate Cases as to Antwan L. Wright (1), Leonard C. Jones (2), Ray S. titleInfo.title: USA v. Wright et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting in part 48 Motion to Extend Pretrial Motion Deadline as to Ray S. Thomas (3); granting in part 50 Oral Motion as to Joseph T. Jordan (4). Pretrial Motion Deadline extended to 3/16/2009 as to defendants Thomas and Jordan. Defendants Thomas and Jordan shall file waivers of speedy trial as soon as practicable. The time between 2/23/2009 and 3/16/2009 is excluded under the Speedy Trial Act. Ordered by Magistrate Judge F. A. Gossett. Pretrial Motion Deadline extended to 3/16/2009 as to defendants Thomas and Jordan. Defendants Thomas and Jordan shall file waivers of speedy trial as soon as practicable. The time between 2/23/2009 and 3/16/2009 is excluded under the Speedy Trial Act. Ordered by Magistrate Judge F. A. Gossett. ( CLS, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Wright et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting 113 Motion to Extend Time to File Pretrial Motions, as to Frederick R. Croffer. Pretrial Motion Deadline set for 5/5/2009. Defendant is ordered to file a waiver of speedy trial as soon as practicable. The time between April 21, 2009 and May 5, 2009, shall be deemed excludable time in any computation of time under the requirement of the Speedy Trial Act. Trial will be set by further order of the court. Ordered by Magistrate Judge F. A. Gossett. (JAE)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Wright et al
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to Leonard C. Jones. Defendant pled guilty to count I of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a total term of 120 months; 5 years Supervised Release with special conditions; $100 Special Assessment. Defendant shall surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by the Bureau of Prisons before 2:00 P.M. on August 28, 2009 as to defendant Leonard C. Jones. Ordered by Judge Laurie Smith Camp. (4 Certified copies to USM)(MKR)

Thomas. Ordered by Judge Laurie Smith Camp. (1 certified copy to USM)(CJP)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Wright et al
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to Frederick R. Croffer (5). Defendant pleaded guilty to Count I of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of Bureau of Prisons for 120 months; 5 years supervised release with special conditions; $100 Special Assessment. Counts XV, XVII, XIX, and XXI of the indictment are dismissed on motion of the Government as to defendant Frederick R. Croffer. Ordered by Judge Laurie Smith Camp. (4 Certified copies to USM)(CCB)
